commit.message: update netty-all to 4.1.53 and update netty-sm-ssl-context to 1.2.0

Merge pull request #715 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

update netty-all to 4.1.53 and update netty-sm-ssl-context to 1.2.0

Merge pull request #720 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

Release 2.7.0

Merge pull request #721 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

fix getBlockHeader

Merge pull request #722 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

add sm2 sign verify interface

Merge pull request #724 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

rename getReceiptsByBlockHashAndRange and getReceiptsByBlockNumberAnd…

Merge pull request #726 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

getBlockReceipts bug fix

Merge pull request #729 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

add CallResult to ContractCallException

Merge pull request #730 from ywy2090/release-2.7.0

update version number
